fields.Title of Contribution: <span style="font-size:12pt;">“The Politics of Reconciliation: Conservative Evangelicals, America’s Original Sin, and a Rhetoric of Engaged Indifference”</span><span style="font-size:medium;"></span>
fields.Description/Abstract: This article is an analysis of an article on the "Desiring God" about the value of equality. (<a href="https://www.desiringgod.org/articles/the-dark-side-of-equality" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">https://www.desiringgod.org/articles/the-dark-side-of-equality</a>) In it, I update the theory I presented in my 2021 book active-passivism to become engaged-indifference. I show how Christian reasoning allows believers to tackle difficult issues in ways that allow them to seem both engaged and aware, while also denying any real responsibility or appetite for change.
